title: JHIN BUG ANYONE ELSE NOTICED?
body: When I am playing with High Noon Jhin {{champion:202}} and there is an opposing Jhin with the classic skin my marks sometimes will show up as he classic purple mark instead of the orange mark from High Noon. Also my Deadly flourish would change to classic sometimes too when triggered by an enemy. Has Anyone else seen this happen?

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! This is a case of particle theft. D: We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
